comment.brief: Matches if the page is in front of, or will be in front of, the active page.
comment.full:
Matches if the page is in front of, or will be in front of, the active page.

This matches in both a forward and backward direction.

comment.brief: Matches if the page is behind, or will be behind, the active page.
comment.full:
Matches if the page is behind, or will be behind, the active page.

This matches in both a forward and backward direction.

comment.brief: Matches only when the page is becoming the active one.
comment.full: Matches only when the page is becoming the active one.

comment.brief: Matches only when the page is becoming an inactive one.
comment.full: Matches only when the page is becoming an inactive one.

comment.brief: Matches when the page is becoming inactive and moving behind the active one.
comment.full: Matches when the page is becoming inactive and moving behind the active one.

comment.brief: Matches when the page is becoming active and moving from behind the active one.
comment.full: Matches when the page is becoming active and moving from behind the active one.

comment.brief: Matches when the page is becoming inactive and moving in front of the active one.
comment.full: Matches when the page is becoming inactive and moving in front of the active one.

comment.brief: Matches when the page is becoming active and moving from in front of the active one.
comment.full: Matches when the page is becoming active and moving from in front of the active one.

comment.brief: Matches if the page is behind, or will be behind, the active page.
comment.full:
Matches if the page is behind, or will be behind, the active page.

This matches in both a forward and backward direction.
